title: Dare Eat That: A Guide to Bizarre Foods from Around the World
description: There are people who travel to eat and people who travel for adventure.And then there are those who travel to eat adventurously.Divya and Vivek are one such couple.From using sign language to haggle over ant eggs in Bangkok to being hungry enough to eat a horse in Luxembourg, from finding out the perfect eel to barbecue to discovering the best place to source emu eggs in India, Dare Eat That explores their journey to eat every species on earth, at least once!
author: Divya Anand
